usa: Inauguration of Donald Trump: Donald Trump is inaugurated as the forty-fifth president of the United States.
The Tax Cuts and Jobs Act of 2017 is signed into law, lowering income tax rates and the corporate tax rate.
india: The Goods and Services Tax (GST) launched, the biggest tax reform in history of India.
australia: John Cameron sets off the chain of events that became the 2017 Australian parliamentary eligibility crisis.
